content: Can you provide me with the name of the production designer who demonstrated exceptional skill in bringing the magical world of "Pan's Labyrinth" to life with their intricate set design? I am looking for the specific individual who was responsible for creating the visually stunning world of the critically acclaimed movie.

The production designer responsible for the visually stunning and intricate set design of "Pan's Labyrinth" is Eugenio Caballero. His work on the film was widely praised for its creativity and ability to bring the magical and dark world of the movie to life.
